blocks.text: This dashboard provides an overview and details on your Efficiency & Rework analysis. Changes and Rework can cause more manual effort, higher throughput times, mistakes, and process loops.
Reduce manual changes & rework on Sales Documents and Invoices
Avoid unnecessary Delivery Blocks, Order Returns and Order Rejections
Increase Order building, usage of Contracts and Outline Agreements

Structure of the Dashboard
  Page 1 - Overview: Change Rate Overview.
Page 2 - Impact: Overview of all changes and their impact on your Order-to-Cash process.
Page 3 - Root Causes: Deep Dive into drivers of the process bottlenecks and action proposals.
Page 4 - Case Details: An exportable list of single cases and their most important attributes that can be filtered.
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.
Kindly provide feedback on the Dashboard, this will aid us in enhancing its functionality.

children.name: Number of Cases
children.description: Number of cases covered in the data set

children.name: Change Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases with changes

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (ChangeType = 'Update')
      )
  ) / COUNT(DISTINCT CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Percentage of cases with changes"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Number of Changes per Case
children.description: Average number of unique changes per case

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        COUNT (DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") FILTER (
          WHERE
            ChangeType = 'Update'
        )
    )
  ) AS "Average number of changes per case"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Value of Cases with Changes
children.description: Amount of cases with changes

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  SUM (InvoiceItemTotalNetAmountCurrConverted) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (ChangeType = 'Update')
      )
  ) AS "Total number of cases with changes"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Change Events
children.description: Total number of change events in data set with change type = 'Update'

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (DISTINCT "UniqueEventId")
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE
  ChangeType = 'Update'

children.name: AVG Cycle Time with Change Activities
children.description: Average cycle time with change activities

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME)
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME)
    )
  ) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (ChangeType = 'Update')
      )
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Time loss for SO Item -> Outbound Delivery Cycle Time with Changes
children.description: Average time loss from Sales Order Item creation to Outbound Delivery with change events comparing with cases, where no changes happened

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG(
    (
      SELECT
        LAST(end_time)
      WHERE
        event_name IN ('Create Outbound Delivery')
    ) -(
      SELECT
        FIRST(end_time)
      WHERE
        event_name IN ('Create Sales Order Item')
    )
  ) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%')
          OR BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%')
      )
  ) - AVG(
    (
      SELECT
        LAST(end_time)
      WHERE
        event_name IN ('Create Outbound Delivery')
    ) -(
      SELECT
        FIRST(end_time)
      WHERE
        event_name IN ('Create Sales Order Item')
    )
  ) FILTER (
    WHERE
      NOT (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (ChangeType = 'Update')
      )
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Cycle Time without Change Activities
children.description: Average cycle time without change activities

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME)
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME)
    )
  )
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  NOT (
    SELECT
      BOOL_OR (ChangeType = 'Update')
  )

children.name: Number of SO Rejections
children.description: Total number of Sales Order Item rejections in the data set

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name LIKE 'Reject Sales%'
      ) AS rejections MATCHES (rejections)
  )
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)

blocks.text: On this page, you can deep dive into the impact of changes on your organization and get the first insights for taking action.

children.name: Change Events Overview
children.description: Overview of change events. Occurrences are calculated by unique change number

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN event_name LIKE '%Sales Doc%' THEN 'Sales Doc'
    WHEN event_name LIKE '%Quotation%' THEN 'Quotation'
    WHEN event_name LIKE '%Delivery Item%' THEN 'Delivery Item'
    WHEN event_name LIKE '%Invoice%' THEN 'Invoice'
    WHEN event_name LIKE '%Dunning%' THEN 'Dunning'
    ELSE 'Other'
  END AS "Change Category",
  "ChangeType"  AS "Change Type",
  event_name AS "Event Name",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") AS "# Occurrences",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") FILTER(
    WHERE
      "EventCreatedByUserType" = 'Dialog'
  ) AS "# Manual Changes",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") FILTER(
    WHERE
      "EventCreatedByUserType" IN ('System', 'Service', 'Batch Job')
  ) / COUNT(DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") * 100 AS "Automation Rate in %"
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE
  ChangeType = 'Update'
ORDER BY
  3 DESC

children.name: Manual Change Rate by SD Customer Country
children.description: Manual change rate by SD Customer Country

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT case_id) AS "# of SDs",
  (
    COUNT(DISTINCT case_id) FILTER (
      WHERE
        BEHAVIOR (
          "EventCreatedByUserType" IN ('Dialog')
          AND ChangeType = 'Update'
        ) AS created_with_dialog MATCHES (created_with_dialog)
    )
  ) / COUNT(DISTINCT "case_id") * 100 AS "Change rate",
  "SalesDocCustomerCountry" AS "SD Customer Country"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY
  1 DESC

children.name: Number of manual SO Changes by Company Code Name (Top 20)
children.description: Total number of manual Sales Order changes by Company Code name

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") AS "# Changes per case",
  event_name AS "SO Change",
  "InvoiceCompanyCode" AS "Company Code Name"
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE
  BEHAVIOR (
    "EventCreatedByUserType" IN ('Dialog')
    AND event_name LIKE '%Sales Doc%'
    AND ChangeType = 'Update'
  ) AS created_with_dialog MATCHES (created_with_dialog)
GROUP BY 2,3
ORDER BY
  1 DESC
LIMIT 20

children.name: Manual Change Rate by SD Item Net Value Range
children.description: Distribution of change rate for manually created changes by Sales Document amount

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT case_id) AS "# SDs",
  (
    COUNT(DISTINCT case_id) FILTER (
      WHERE
        BEHAVIOR (
          "EventCreatedByUserType" IN ('Dialog')
          AND ChangeType = 'Update'
        ) AS created_with_dialog MATCHES (created_with_dialog)
    )
  ) / COUNT(DISTINCT "case_id") * 100 AS "Change rate",
  CASE
    WHEN SalesDocItemNetValue <= 10 THEN '0 - 10'
    WHEN SalesDocItemNetValue > 10
    AND SalesDocItemNetValue <= 1000 THEN '10 - 1.000'
    WHEN SalesDocItemNetValue > 1000
    AND SalesDocItemNetValue <= 10000 THEN '1.000 - 10.000'
    ELSE '10.000+'
  END AS "Sales Document Item Net Value Range"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY
  1 DESC
LIMIT
  20

children.name: Top 10 Manual Price Changes by Sales Organization and Material Group
children.description: Relationship between manual price changes by Sales Organization and Sales Material Group

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  (
    COUNT(DISTINCT case_id) FILTER (
      WHERE
        BEHAVIOR (
          "EventCreatedByUserType" IN ('Dialog')
          AND ChangeType = 'Update'
        ) AS created_with_dialog MATCHES (created_with_dialog)
    )
  ) / COUNT(DISTINCT "case_id") * 100 AS "Change rate",
   "SalesDocItemMaterialGroup"   AS "Material Group",
   "SalesDocSalesOrganization"  AS "Sales Organization"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY
  1 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: Change Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases with at least one change over all cases in data set

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE

        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (ChangeType = 'Update')

children.name: AVG number of changes per case
children.description: Average number of unique changes per case

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        COUNT (DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") FILTER (
          WHERE

children.name: Percentage of SOs with Changes over Time
children.description: Percentage of Sales Orders with changes over time (SO Item creation date) by Company Code name

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'month',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
          WHERE
            event_name = 'Create Sales Order Item'
        )
    )
  ) AS "SO Item Creation Date",
  COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (ChangeType = 'Update')
      )
  ) / COUNT(DISTINCT case_id) * 100 AS "Percentage of cases with changes",
  "InvoiceCompanyCode" AS "Company Code Name"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY
  1 ASC FILL TIMESERIES('month')

children.name: Cycle Time vs Number of Changes
children.description: Relationship between average cycle time and number of changes per case

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  "# Changes per case",
  "CycleTime" AS "AVG Cycle Time"
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      AVG (
        (
          SELECT
            COUNT (DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") FILTER (
              WHERE
                ChangeType = 'Update'
            )
        )
      ) AS "# Changes per case",
      (
        SELECT
          LAST (END_TIME)
      ) - (
        SELECT
          FIRST (END_TIME)
      ) AS "CycleTime"
    FROM
      THIS_PROCESS
  ) AS sub_query TABLESAMPLE EXACT(100 ROWS) REPEATABLE(123)

children.name: Top-10 Change Rate distribution by Plant and Company Code Name
children.description: Change rate distribution by Sales Order Plant and Company Code name

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (ChangeType = 'Update')          
      )
  ) / COUNT(DISTINCT CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Change Rate",
  "InvoiceCompanyCode",
  "SalesDocItemPlant"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY
  1 DESC
LIMIT
  10

children.name: Number of SDs with Changes over Time based on Day of Occurrence
children.description: Number of sales documents with changes over time based on day of occurrence (change date) by Company Code name

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'month',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
          WHERE
            ChangeType = 'Update'
        )
    )
  ) AS "SD Item Change Date",
  COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (ChangeType = 'Update')
      )
  ) AS "# of cases with changes",
  "InvoiceCompanyCode" AS "Company Code Name"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY
  1 ASC FILL TIMESERIES('month')

children.name: Manual Change Rate by Top 10 Material
children.description: Change rate by material for changes done manually

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT case_id) AS "# of SDs",
  (
    COUNT(DISTINCT case_id) FILTER (
      WHERE
        BEHAVIOR (
          "EventCreatedByUserType" IN ('Dialog')
          AND ChangeType = 'Update'
        ) AS created_with_dialog MATCHES (created_with_dialog)
    )
  ) / COUNT(DISTINCT "case_id") * 100 AS "Change rate",
  "SalesDocItemMaterial" AS "SD Material"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY
  1 DESC
LIMIT
  10

blocks.text: The purpose of this page is to drill down into the potential root causes of bad performance identified onthe previous page.

children.name: Number of Quotations
children.description: Total number of Quotations in data set

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (DISTINCT "case_id") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name LIKE 'Create Quotation Item%'
      ) AS created MATCHES (created)
  )
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)

children.name: Number of Quotation Changes
children.description: Total number of Quotation changes

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT "UniqueEventId" ) FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name LIKE '%Quotation%'
        AND ChangeType = 'Update'
      ) AS changed MATCHES (changed)
  ) AS "# Changes"
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)

children.name: Number of Quotation Changes over time
children.description: Number of Quotation changes over time (date of change occurrence)

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('month', end_time) AS "Change Date",
  COUNT (DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") AS "# Changes"
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME LIKE '%Quotation%'
  AND ChangeType = 'Update'
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('Month'),
  NULL

children.name: TOP 10 Customers with most Quotation Changes
children.description: Top 10 Customers affected by most Quotation changes

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOUR (
        EVENT_NAME LIKE '%Quotation%'
        AND ChangeType = 'Update'
      ) AS changes MATCHES (changes)
  ) AS "# Changes",
  "SalesDocCustomerCompany"
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
GROUP BY
  2
ORDER BY
  1 DESC
LIMIT
  10

          AND ChangeType = 'Update'

  ) / COUNT(DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") * 100
FROM

WHERE

    event_name LIKE '%Quotation%'
    AND ChangeType = 'Update'
  )

blocks.text: The following section gives a deep dive into Quotation changes.
The following section gives a deep dive into Sales Order changes including Sales Order Item changes.
The following section gives a deep dive into Outbound Delivery changes including Outbound Delivery Item changes.
The following section gives a deep dive into Invoice changes including .

children.name: Number of Delivery Item Changes over time
children.description: Number of Delivery Item changes over time (date of change occurrence)

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', end_time) AS "Change Date", 
COUNT (DISTINCT "UniqueEventId")  as "# Changes"
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE 	EVENT_NAME LIKE '%Delivery%' 
		AND ChangeType = 'Update'
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('Month'), NULL

children.name: TOP 10 Customers with most Invoice Changes
children.description: Top 10 Customers affected by most Invoice changes

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOUR (
        EVENT_NAME LIKE '%Invoice%'
        AND ChangeType = 'Update'
      ) AS changes MATCHES (changes)
  ) AS "# Changes",
  "SalesDocCustomerCompany"
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
GROUP BY
  2
ORDER BY
  1 DESC
LIMIT
  10

children.name: Number of Outbound Deliveries
children.description: Total number of Outbound Deliveries in data set

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT DeliveryId) FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name = 'Create Outbound Delivery'
      ) AS created MATCHES (created)
  )
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)

children.name: Efficiency and Rework Overview ordered by Invoice Value
children.description: Overview ordered by Invoice Value

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  SalesDocSalesOrganization,
  SalesDocCustomerCountry,
  SalesDocCustomerCompany,
  SalesDocItemCategory,
  SalesDocItemMaterial,
  SalesDocItemMaterialGroup,
  SalesDocItemPlant,
  SalesDocType,
  SalesDocSalesOffice,
  SalesDocTradingPartner,
  ---Metrics---
  COUNT(case_id) AS "# Sales Documents",
  SUM("InvoiceItemTotalNetAmountCurrConverted") AS "Invoice Item Total Net Amount Converted",
  COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (ChangeType = 'Update')
      )
  ) / COUNT(DISTINCT case_id) * 100 AS "Percentage of cases with changes",
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        COUNT (DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") FILTER (
          WHERE
            ChangeType = 'Update'
        )
    )
  ) AS "Average number of changes",
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME)
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME)
    )
  ) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (ChangeType = 'Update')
      )
  ) AS "Average Cycle Time with Change Activities",
  COUNT (DISTINCT case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name LIKE 'Create Quotation Item%'
      ) AS created MATCHES (created)
  ) AS "# Quotations",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name LIKE '%Quotation%'
        AND ChangeType = 'Update'
      ) AS created_with_dialog MATCHES (created_with_dialog)
  ) AS "# of Quotation Changes", 
  COUNT (DISTINCT case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name = 'Create Sales Order Item'
      ) AS created MATCHES (created)
  )  AS "# of Sales Orders Items",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name LIKE '%Sales%'
        AND ChangeType = 'Update'
      ) AS changed MATCHES (changed)
  ) AS "# of SO Changes",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "DeliveryId") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name = 'Create Outbound Delivery'
      ) AS created MATCHES (created)
  ) AS "# of Delivery Items",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name LIKE '%Delivery%'
        AND ChangeType = 'Update'
      ) AS changed MATCHES (changed)
  ) AS "# of Delivery Item Changes",
  COUNT (DISTINCT "InvoiceId") AS "# Invoices",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name LIKE '%Invoice%'
        AND ChangeType = 'Update'
      ) AS changed MATCHES (changed)
  ) AS "# of Invoice Changes",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "UniqueEventId") FILTER (
    WHERE
      BEHAVIOR (
        event_name LIKE 'Reject Sales%'
      ) AS rejections MATCHES (rejections)
  ) AS "# of SO Item Rejections"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  InvoiceItemTotalNetAmountCurrConverted IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  12 DESC

children.name: Sales Document Details
children.description: Case details for further investigation

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  case_id,
  "SalesDocId",
(
    SELECT
      LAST(end_time) FILTER (
        WHERE
          event_name IN (
            'Create Sales Order Item',
            'Create Quotation Item',
            'Create Contract Item'
          )
      )
  ) AS "SO Creation Date",
  "SalesDocType",
  "SalesDocSalesOrganization",
  "SalesDocItemQuantityOrdered",
  "SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed",
  "DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered",
  "LastDeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime" AS "On Time",
CASE
    WHEN "SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed" = "DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered" THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN "SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed" < "DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered" THEN 'Overdelivery'
    WHEN "SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed" > "DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered" THEN 'No'
  END AS "In Full",
  "SalesDocItemNetValue",
  "SalesDocCustomerCompany",
  "SalesDocCustomerCountry",
  "SalesDocItemMaterialGroup",
  "SalesDocItemMaterial",
  "SalesDocLastConfirmedDeliveryDate",
  "SalesDocPlannedShipmentDate" --  ,"SalesDocLastConfirmedDeliveryDate" >= "SalesDocPlannedShipmentDate" AS "On Time"
,
  "LastDeliveryWarehouse",
  COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (ChangeType = 'Update')
      )
  ) AS "# of changes"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY
  3 DESC

children.name: Details of Sales Documents with multiple release date updates

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  "Case Id",
  "CASE_COUNT" AS "SO Release Date Updates",
  "SalesDocType",
  "SalesDocSalesOrganization",
  "SalesDocSalesOffice",
  "SalesDocItemQuantityOrdered",
  "SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed",
  "SalesDocItemNetValue",
  "SalesDocCustomerCompany",
  "SalesDocCustomerCountry",
  "SalesDocItemMaterialGroup",
  "SalesDocItemMaterial",
  "SalesDocId"
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      DISTINCT COUNT("CASE_ID") OVER (PARTITION BY "CASE_ID", "EVENT_NAME") AS "CASE_COUNT",
      case_id AS "Case Id",
      "SalesDocType",
      "SalesDocSalesOrganization",
      "SalesDocSalesOffice",
      "SalesDocItemQuantityOrdered",
      "SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed",
      "SalesDocItemNetValue",
      "SalesDocCustomerCompany",
      "SalesDocCustomerCountry",
      "SalesDocItemMaterialGroup",
      "SalesDocItemMaterial",
      "SalesDocId"
    FROM
      FLATTEN("THIS_PROCESS")
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME LIKE '%Sales Doc Release date'
      AND ChangeType = 'Update'
  ) AS SUB
WHERE
  CASE_COUNT > 1
